data.title: Donna Summer: Credits, Bio, News & More
data.meta_description: Searching to find out more about Donna Summer? We have a full Biography, Photos, Theatre Credits, TV and Movies, Videos and more! Check out Donna Summer's bio now including film and tv, as well as on stage.
data.text:
Donna Summer News

Video: Colman Domingo Praises SING SING Co-Stars on LATE NIGHT WITH SETH MEYERS

Colman Domingo stopped by Late Night with Seth Meyers on Monday to discuss his latest film, Sing Sing. The movie centers on a group of incarcerated men who participate in a program called Rehabilitation Through the Arts (RTA), which sees them putting on plays together and finding communal and individual healing.

THE PROM Starring Kate Baldwin & More to Begin Performances at Sharon Playhouse This Month

The Sharon Playhouse is set to present The Prom. Learn how to purchase tickets.

Tayla Parx Eclipses Expectations On New Album 'Many Moons, Many Suns'

Multi-faceted multiple GRAMMY-Award nominated singer/songwriter, producer, actress, and entrepreneur Tayla Parx unveils her third album Many Moons, Many Suns. The 13-track record also features her previously released summer anthem “Era” (feat. Tkay Maidza), which received glowing critical praise upon release. Listen to it here!

Adam Bashian, Abby C. Smith & More to Join Arrow Rock Lyceum Theatre's CHARLIE AND THE CHOCOLATE FACTORY

Arrow Rock Lyceum Theatre presents CHARLIE AND THE CHOCOLATE FACTORY from July 19-28, featuring music from HAIRSPRAY songwriters and classic film hits. Join Charlie and friends on a magical adventure.

THE VILLAGE! A DISCO DAYDREAM and DAVID'S FRIEND Begin Performances Tonight at SoHo Playhouse

SoHo Playhouse will present a special double bill this summer of The Village! A Disco Daydream and David’s Friend. Learn how to purchase tickets.

Boys & Girls Clubs of Miami-Dade Will Host 16th Annual “Wild About Kids” Gala

Boys & Girls Clubs of Miami-Dade will host its annual black-tie “Wild About Kids” Disco Ball at the Loews Coral Gables Hotel on Saturday, Oct. 26, 2024.

Feature: BroadwayWorld Cabaret Upcoming Show Roundup �" July 8 to July 14, 2024

Are you trying to plan your entertainment for the week or looking for a fun show to see this weekend? We have you covered with a few top picks for jazz, cabaret, comedy, and more! NYC has so many incredible events, but here are a few top picks to consider this week including female power, shower singing and singer-songwriters.

Donna Summer Tribute Concert to Illuminate The Leavitt Theatre Stage in Ogunquit, Maine

The Leavitt Theatre, in conjunction with JM Productions of Quincy, MA., has announced a spectacular tribute concert honoring the Queen of Disco, Donna Summer, on July 13th!

Interview: R&B Group Honey Cone Makes Their 54 Below Debut on July 13th

Honey Cone, the timeless hit-making group and members of the Soul Music Hall of Fame, make their 54 Below debut in Honey Cone: Now, Then & Forever. Named the “Best Female Vocal Group” by the National Association of Television and Radio Announcers, Honey Cone will take the audience on a thrilling journey through their celebrated music catalog.

Linda Eder, Laura and Linda Benanti, and More to Play 54 Below Next Month

Next month, 54 BELOW, Broadway's Supper Club & Private Event Destination, will present some of the brightest stars from Broadway, cabaret, jazz, and beyond.

Live At The Art House Announces The Return Of “RuPaul's Drag Race's” Ginger Minj To Provincetown

Live at the Art Houe has announced the return of 'RuPaul's Drag Race's' Ginger Minj to Provincetown with Gidget Galore in The Broads' Way 2: Electric Boobaloo, June 22- September 14.

Video: Watch a First Look at SING SING With Colman Domingo

A24 has unveiled a first look at the upcoming film Sing Sing, which revolves around a theatre group consisting of incarcerated men. In the video, Academy Award nominee Colman Domingo, breakout star Clarence Maclin, and the filmmakers take you behind the scenes of their critically acclaimed new film —including its groundbreaking production model and the true brotherhood that brought it to life.

STUDIO 54 THE MUSICAL in Development for Broadway

Producers Robert Greenblatt and Neil Meron are developing Studio 54 The Musical, a new work with a book by Chad Hodge and music by the greatest disco artists of all-time. Learn more!

Cast Set For Transcendence Theatre Company's DON'T STOP US NOW

Transcendence Theatre Company will continue its 2024 summer season, Broadway in Sonoma, with the world premiere of Don't Stop Us Now. The brand new production is a creative collaboration between MidAtlantic Men, Queenz That Rock, and Transcendence Theatre Company, conceived and directed by beloved Transcendence performers Simon Pearl and Emily Yates.

PRIDE ANTHEMS Comes to Joe's Pub This Week

Pride Anthems the hit concert tour will celebrate Pride Month with a special NYC performance featuring special guest star Lempicka's Natalie Joy Johnson!

Spotlight: PRIDE ANTHEMS at Tilles Center

Pride Anthems @ Tilles Center: 'I Will Survive,' 'Time Warp,' 'Express Yourself,' and more!

VINCENT Comes to 54 Below This Summer

54 Below will present Matt DeMaria’s Vincent on Friday, August 9 at 9:30pm.

Review: THE CHER SHOW at Curran Theatre

The Cher Show blows through town faster than the multitude of Bob Mackie costume changes and we’re better off for it. Even die-hard Cher fanatics had a challenging time mustering excitement for this tired jukebox musical, settling for the flash and cheese of 60’s style comic vignettes rather than delving into perhaps some interesting insight into the resilient pop icon who bucked the male dominated entertainment scene.

Breton Tyner-Bryan's LET HER GO To Premiere At Emberlight International Film Festival

Breton Tyner-Bryan's film LET HER GO will have its World and North American Premiere at the Emberlight International Film Festival. The film recently won the RAW Selection at Berlin Commercial Film Festival.
